messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Certificate of empowerment.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/30/03 9:22:20 AM, KindredSpiritsYoga@caro.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/30/03 9:22:20 AM, KindredSpiritsYoga@... writes:

<< I'm new to the group and noticed that at a friends house yesterday she had
a
certificate of empowerment up on her fridge. I noticed your name as the
signature and wanted to know how i could get one. She got hers at the
unschooling conference in south carolina last year.
It's very inspirational and i'd love to have a copy! >>

By mail a dollar, or go to a conference!
(Much cheaper to send me a dollar, though...)

I'm going to have to take it to a real printer, because photocopying them has
become too expensive, and mailing them takes over 50 cents now and an
envelope! (I hate to fold them to get the 37 cent thang...)

BUT...
if you don't care about the format or the signature or the colored paper,
it's online here:

http://sandradodd.com/empowerment

Or you can borrow your friend's and photocopy it if it wasn't too dark a
color. I use mixed-color papers so people can pick a color they like, when I
can.

Someone adapted it for a health site called "Procovery" and that's cool to
see too:

http://216.239.39.100/search?q=cache:FnQTNa3XdJsC:www.procovery.com/files/cert

ificate_of_empowerment.pdf+certificate+of+empowerment+sandra+dodd&hl=en&ie=UTF

-8

I was flattered.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Certificate of empowerment.

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/30/2003 12:14:03 PM Eastern Standard Time,
KindredSpiritsYoga@... writes:
> how do iget a conference schedule?
>
SOS's not up yet, but you can look at last year's to see what it was like. My
husband insists we should have it up by Feb 15. Bear with me until Feb 28! <G>
I'll post as soon as things are up and running!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support

messages.subject: Certificate of empowerment.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sandra, I m new to the group and noticed that at a friends house yesterday she had a certificate of empowerment up on her fridge. I noticed your name as the
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sandra,
I'm new to the group and noticed that at a friends house yesterday she had a
certificate of empowerment up on her fridge. I noticed your name as the
signature and wanted to know how i could get one. She got hers at the
unschooling conference in south carolina last year.
It's very inspirational and i'd love to have a copy!

Thanks,
Chris

----------
